topics.body:
part 1

honestly my least developed ideas kind of end up being the heroes themselves
they are young, about 18-22
unlike most heroes who have a variety of abilities, they each have only one power, so has super strength, one has telekinetic abilities, one has ice powers, one can fly, but they only have that
i would think that telekinetic abilities should develop like a muscle, so he can start by lifting smaller objects like cinder blocks, but can't affect anything extremely heavy, or fast moving like bullets without practice and time

my only two heroes i've actually developed would be my super strenght, and telekinetic heroes

the strength one is a jack-ass, drinks and smokes regularly, but he cares about the people who are close to him, though that isn't very many
but he isn't a buddy-buddy guy
frankly he has no issues being blunt to everyone, or punching them square in the jaw assuming they get him angry

my telekinetic character, is quiet, awkward, makes bad decisions, but always tries to help everyone in a situation
he hates to see people argue and fight, he cares about everyone around him, and he tries shows it
at the same time, he could go too far, eventually at some point risking his life to save someone, and it's not a maybe
the actual situation i keep imaging involves extreme, horrendous amounts of pain

i have one other character, but it's kind of weird, he's also the only character with more than one main ability
he's a rude, asshole, constantly judging people, considering himself the better of everyone, and kind of a snob
he cares about everyone, some more than others
he has dragon powers
his hands can become claws, his skin can become rock-hard scales, he can grow dragon wings, he can breathe fire, and at some point just straight up turn into a small dragon

it's weird and a secondary idea, that if i could work, i would include
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
part 2

i have an idea that most generic goons and thugs become a more possible threat, because of a recently developed illegal drug a major villain develops, that gives people more strength and stamina, etc (like enough to take a punch from a hero with super strength) but can be extremely deadly and is extremely addictive

one of the lesser villains, who few character actually takes seriously, is a faux-goth/emo chick, who craves attention from people
her power is control over ravens and crows
she falls in love with strenght dude, but when he realizes she is insane, he break up with her, but her response is not to seek violent revenge on him
it is to cause constant annoyance to the people of the city, but nothing that ever actually seems like a serious threat, to get his attention back
the heroes only consider her a huge annoyance, and just argue over who should deal with her during any situation

at some point the major villain who runs the drug rings, hires a team of assassins to try to take out the heroes, and the fight each other on multiple occasions
during their actual first fight, telekinetic dude knocks the mask off one of the assassins, revealing her to be a woman
he is dumb-struck for moment
and his first thought is
"That is the most beautiful woman i have ever seen in my life."
the next time the groups fight, he seriously starts asking her mid-battle, if she would consider going out with him
obviously, he is insane, but she in a few ways is as well

they actually start a relationship, that eventually leads to death of her brother, as they were both assassins in the group, and her killing the leader of the assassins for revenge

she is kind of psychotic, in that her response to people threatening the life of someone she cares about, like her brother or boyfriend
is extreme violence

oh shit my boyfriend was kidnapped by a badguy
time to break into their place, not even subtly, just bursting in and shooting up everyone, and then threatening to skin the guy alive if he thinks about even touching her boyfriend
